field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the peer.

field.label: Name
field.help: Set the name for this peer.

field.label: Public key
field.help: Public key of this peer. You can generate the key using the private key piped to "wg pubkey".

field.label: Pre-shared key
field.help: Shared secret (PSK) for this peer. You can generate a key using "wg genpsk".

field.label: Allowed IPs
field.help: List of addresses allowed to pass trough the tunnel adapter. Please use CIDR notation like 10.0.0.1/24.

field.label: Endpoint address
field.help: Set public IP address the endpoint listens to.

field.label: Endpoint port
field.help: Set port the endpoint listens to.

field.label: Instances
field.help: List of instances this peer belongs to.

field.label: Keepalive interval
field.help: Set persistent keepalive interval in seconds.
